SEARCH
Package src.music

Class Genre

java.lang.Object
src.music.Genre
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bachata, Merengue, Reggaeton, Salsa, Samba
public abstract class Genre extends Object
The Genre class represents a musical genre in the music library. It serves as the abstract superclass for specific genres and provides common functionality shared by all genres.
